info.name: Rock Paper Shotgun (RPS) - SFW
info.description: A dull and boring but pleasant grey-red look for RPS. Read the best words about exciting games at work without drawing unnecessary attention to it. To be used alongside Firefox plugin YesScript (javascript blocking) by Jason Barnabe (creator of Stylish) - otherwise full page ads overrule settings.
info.additionalInfo:
* No header, sidebar or other crud, just the 'river'/article
* All images hidden until mouse-over (videos completely hidden)
* Oldschool websafe fonts (Tahoma + Georgia)

Creation: 09-01-2017
